name: embeddings-mcp
description: MCP server for codebase embeddings and vector search

scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts --target=bun --outfile=dist/index.js --external express --external cors --external dotenv --external axios --external zod --sourcemap=external
scripts.build:prod: bun build src/index.ts --target=bun --outfile=dist/index.js --minify --external express --external cors --external dotenv --external axios --external zod --sourcemap=external

author: Derivco
